member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.ApplicationBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extends the to provide methods to map a Twilio webhook endpoint.

member.summary: Maps a Twilio webhook endpoint to the specified .
member.param: The to use to map the endpoint.
The relative path to map the endpoint to.
member.returns: Returns the to continue the configuration.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extends the to provide methods to register a Twilio webhook receiver.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddTwilioReceiver(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers a Twilio webhook receiver in the application.
member.param: The to register the receiver.
member.returns: Returns the to continue the configuration.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddTwilioReceiver(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Deveel.Webhooks.TwilioReceiverOptions)
member.summary: Registers a Twilio webhook receiver in the application, providing a set of configuration options.
member.param: The to register the receiver.
The configuration options to use to configure the receiver.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddTwilioReceiver(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Action{Deveel.Webhooks.TwilioReceiverOptions})
member.summary: Registers a Twilio webhook receiver in the application, configuring the options.
member.param: The to register the receiver.
The delegate to use to configure the options.
member.returns: Returns the to continue the configuration.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddTwilioReceiver(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a Twilio webhook receiver in the application, configuring the options from the given configuration section.
member.param: The to register the receiver.
The path to the configuration section to use to configure the receiver.
member.returns: Returns the to continue the configuration.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.TwilioReceiverOptions
member.summary: Provides a set of options for configuring a Twilio webhook receiver.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.TwilioReceiverOptions.AuthToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication token to use for the signature verification.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.TwilioReceiverOptions.VerifySignature
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag indicating if the signature of the webhook must be verified.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.TwilioSignature
member.summary: A utility class to create a Twilio signature for a request.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.TwilioSignature.Create(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a Twilio signature for the specified
member.param: The to create the signature for.
A string containing the Twilio auth token, used as a key to create the signature.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MediaElement
member.summary: Represents the reference to a media element in a Twilio webhook.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MediaElement.Url
member.summary: Gets the URL of the media element.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MediaElement.ContentType
member.summary: Gets the content type of the media element.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MediaElement.ContentLength
member.summary: Gets the size of the media element.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessagePart
member.summary: Represents a part of a messaging conversation.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessagePart.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Gets the phone number of the messaging part

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessagePart.Country
member.summary: Gets the country code of the messaging part

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessagePart.State
member.summary: Gets the state of the messaging part

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessagePart.City
member.summary: Gets the city name of the messaging part

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessagePart.Zip
member.summary: Gets the postal code of the messaging part

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus
member.summary: Enumerates the possible values for the status of a Twilio message

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The status of the message is unknown

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Accepted
member.summary: Twilio has received the message and is attempting to send it

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Queued
member.summary: Twilio has queued the message for delivery, but has not yet sent it

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Sending
member.summary: Twilio is currently sending the message

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Sent
member.summary: Twilio has successfully sent the message to the destination phone number

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Failed
member.summary: Twilio was unable to send the message to the destination phone number (e.g. due to an invalid number).

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Delivered
member.summary: The message was successfully delivered to the destination phone number

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Undelivered
member.summary: Twilio was unable to deliver the message to the destination phone number

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Receiving
member.summary: Twilio is currently receiving a reply to the original message

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.MessageStatus.Received
member.summary: Twilio has successfully received a reply to the original message

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.Segment
member.summary: Represents a segment of a message received from Twilio.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.Segment.Index
member.summary: Gets the zero-based offset of the segment in the message.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.Segment.Text
member.summary: Gets the body text of the segment.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.Segment.MessageId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the message part for the segment.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook
member.summary: Represents a message webhook from Twilio

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.From
member.summary: Gets the that represents the sender of the message.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.To
member.summary: Gets the that represents the receiver of the message.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.SmsId
member.summary: Gets the unique ID of the SMS message sent to the recipient's phone

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.MessageStatus
member.summary: Gets the status of the message

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.Body
member.summary: Gets the body of the message

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.SegmentCount
member.summary: Gets the number of segments used to send the message

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.MessageId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the message

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.AccountId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the Account that initiated the message

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.ApiVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the Twilio API used to handle the message

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.Media
member.summary: Gets an optional array of media elements that are attached to the message, referencing external resources.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.Segments
member.summary: Gets an optional array of segments that compose the message, when the message is longer than 160 characters.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets the error code, if the message was not delivered

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets the error message, if the message was not delivered

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookReceiverBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extends the to add support for handling Twilio webhooks.

member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookReceiverBuilderExtensions.HandleTwilio``1(Deveel.Webhooks.WebhookReceiverBuilder{Deveel.Webhooks.Twilio.TwilioWebhook})
member.summary: Adds a handler for Twilio webhooks.
member.typeparam: The type of handler that supports Twilio webhooks.
member.param: The instance of the to add the handler to.
member.returns: Returns the same instance of the to allow further chaining of the builder.
